schedule:
01: Computer Networks and the Internet Overview（第1週~第2週）
Network Concept and Terminology
02: The Application Layer（第3週~第4週）
Application Structure and Protocols
Example Computer Network Applications
03: The Transport Layer（第5週~第6週）
Multiplexing and Demultiplexing
Reliable Transport and Sliding Windows
Connection-Oriented vs. Connectionless Transport Protocols
Congestion Control
04: The Network Layer and Routing（第7週~第9週）
Routing Principles and IP Routing
IP v4 Protocols and Addressing
Router Structure
IP v6
Multicast Routing
05: The Data Link Layer and Local Area Networks（第10週~第12週）
Error Detection and Correction
Local Area Network Architectures and Concepts
06: Wireless and Mobile Networks（第13週）
WiFi and WiMax
07: Multi-Media Networking（第14週~第15週）
Streaming Audio and Video
Quality of Service Issues
08: Network Security（第16週）
Cryptography
SSL
09: Network Management（第17週）
Management Framework
SNMP
scorePolicy:
Home works and Project: 30%
Midterm exam: 35%
Final exam: 35%
